name: DAISENRYAKU PERFECT 4.0/大戦略パーフェクト4.0
description: The 30th Anniversary Title of the Daisenryaku Series! Fight with over 1500 different units on more than 300 maps in this turn-based, single player war simulation game. Daisenryaku Perfect 4.0 lets you shape your experience like no other game in the series’ 30 year history.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows10/8/7 64bit Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OVer 512MB in video memory  and supporting OpenGL3.1 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OVer 1GB in video memory  and supporting OpenGL4.1 or better
